subject: United States Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Coming up with the crucial points in the first two tie breakers, Roger Federer picked Andy Roddick apart for a 7-6 (5), 7-6 (4), 6-2 victory to advance to the semifinals.
snippet: Coming up with the crucial points in the first two tie breakers, Roger Federer picked Andy Roddick apart for a 7-6 (5), 7-6 (4), 6-2 victory to advance to the semifinals.
